content.question: The schools described in the article are intended for what type of students?

choices.label: Highly motivated students who like to study at a fast pace
Students who are struggling in a regular high school
Artistic students who want to focus on an art curriculum
International students who need extra help with Japanese language

content.answer: Students who are struggling in a regular high school

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe the literal meaning of the text.
